title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 175.4 - Broker's purchase of property listed with him
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 175.4 - Broker's purchase of property listed with him

State Regulations
A real estate broker shall not directly or indirectly buy
for himself property listed with him, nor shall he acquire any interest therein
without first making his true position clearly known to the listing
owner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
175.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
